note: Forgiving yourself can be much harder than forgiving other people. I'm not there yet. I have a tendency to share more personal information than I should or that anyone wants to hear. My first grade teacher's message on my first report card said, "Patty talks too much". Some things never change. I have strong opinions and usually don't mind sharing them. I like living alone, but sometimes it really sucks. #LGBTQ advocate #MentalHealthAdvocate #Soccer #MLS
Ask not for whom the point is missed. It is missed for thee.

I am no one important or influential.
I am older, smaller, more amusing and benign in the real world than I appear to be in cyberspace.
I live near Dallas, TX (and I am not ashamed of that).
My political alignment defies designation.
I can forgive and forget. However, the universe does not operate that way. So don't blame me when everything goes to shit.

#nobot

Trying to not be speechless.
#NAFO Air Support Fella
